list.name: Default
list.comment: Minor Bug Fix Fix a bug with the

task.summary: Style and Syntax Fixes Fix random errors in the style or syntax of files across the project. For more information view the diff. These changes were found through PyCharm's code inspection tool.

Game Logic Update Add in the rest of the game logic, making the game somewhat playable Added in the rest of the checks for each stage, implemented mafia, added a very simple proto-reasoner to simulate an external agent, added in logger messages, cleaned up a little bit of the code, added in some checks so that in the event of bugs dead players can't do anything.
The end game logic still needs to be implemented and the code desperately needs refactored, we also need to add in a display for which players are accusing and suspecting one another in the Discussion stage, but other than that the game is somewhat playable.

End Game Update Added end-game scenario, fixed a few bugs, improved UIX Added win scenarios for mafia and townies, fixed new-game bugs, made it so that (in the discussion stage) clicking an action then clicking another player deselects the acting player.

MESSAGE.value: Style and Syntax Fixes Fix random errors in the style or syntax of files across the project. For more information view the diff. These changes were found through PyCharm's code inspection tool.

Game Logic Update Add in the rest of the game logic, making the game somewhat playable Added in the rest of the checks for each stage, implemented mafia, added a very simple proto-reasoner to simulate an external agent, added in logger messages, cleaned up a little bit of the code, added in some checks so that in the event of bugs dead players can't do anything.
The end game logic still needs to be implemented and the code desperately needs refactored, we also need to add in a display for which players are accusing and suspecting one another in the Discussion stage, but other than that the game is somewhat playable.

End Game Update Added end-game scenario, fixed a few bugs, improved UIX Added win scenarios for mafia and townies, fixed new-game bugs, made it so that (in the discussion stage) clicking an action then clicking another player deselects the acting player.
